Entries.Sun10: I've a good many cozy areas in the house.$u#$b#Pick whichever you like.
Entries.Sat10: At least allow me to attend to my duties ere you seek to distract me.$7#$e#Honestly, you are ridiculous.$1
Entries.summer_Sun4_1: After over a season of your pestering, I have to wonder if your refusal to leave me alone is born not of ignorance, but spite.$6
Entries.winter_Sat10: About now there's nothing I'd like better than to forgo work and laze about.$6#$b#Should the spirit of sloth take you as well, at least fetch me a snack before you settle in.

Entries.Sun10: I've a good many cozy areas in the house to experience, each with their own appeal for lazing on.$u#$b#Pick whichever you like.$u
Entries.Sat10: At least allow me to attend to my duties ere you seek to drag me from work.$7#$e#Honestly, you are ridiculous.
Entries.summer_Sun4_1: I must admit, your tenacity in seeking my time is impressive. Truly you are fazed by little.
Entries.winter_Sat10: About now there's nothing I'd like better than to forgo work and laze about.$6#$b#Should the spirit of sloth take you as well, at least fetch me a snack before you settle in.
Entries.Tue10: And so, a new week of tasks begins.#$e#But if I left my work for any longer than a day or two, I would only start to worry what crisis would greet me upon my return.$6
Entries.Thu10: How you find the time and energy to run about the mountains after a day's farmwork mystifies me.#$b#Simply watching you is enough to exhaust me.
Entries.spring_Sun8: At last, weather where any time spent outside is not an exercise in misery.
Entries.spring_Tue8: Have you tried your hand at growing flowers, by any chance?#$e#I may be convinced to provide seeds from the clematis out front, if it would interest you.
Entries.spring_15: Even having seen him again, this day never gets easier to bear.$9#$e#Still... I am sure he would much rather be remembered for his joys than watch me sulk.#$b#Perhaps I can share some of his bolder moments of general mischief.$1
Entries.summer_Mon10: ...'Tis a humbling sight, the aether of the mountain and its denizens in full bloom.$1
Entries.summer_Wed10: Ah, @. I understand the desire for refuge from the overbearing summer heat.#$e#Let in any insects and you will be thrown back outside, however.$6
Entries.summer_Fri8: You've encountered nothing else out of the ordinary, I hope.#$e#I would not be surprised if some other crisis manifests so soon, but I would be impressed.$6
Entries.fall_Thu8: Will you be setting aside any produce for vinification this season?#$b#The valley produces some lovely wines.$1
Entries.fall_Sat8: You didn't happen to bring espresso as part of your daily offering, did you?#$b#Much remains to be done this eve; were it not for the texture, I would contemplate consuming the grounds of my last batch.$6
Entries.winter_1: And so the colors of fall inevitably fade to the bleakness of winter.#$b#If you have need of me, I will be attempting to force my body to adopt a state of dormancy.#$e#It is a flaw in design that we are not obligate hibernators, in my opinion.$8
Entries.winter_21: ...Hm?#$e#...Azem would have been delighted to meet you, I'm sure.$9#$b#A kindred spirit in romping around the outdoors and unearthing trouble, no doubt.$6
Entries.winter_Wed8: How bored you must be, to trudge through the snow for a visit.#$e#Should you turn to the mines to relieve you of winter's torpor, at least take a measure of precaution.$6[668]#$e#If nothing else, it will save me the trouble of having to wrest you from peril again.$7

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: They are beautiful, are they not? Yet I fear this will be one more sight lost to time.#$e#...Never mind my ramblings. I should be glad for this evening.$9

350/playSound stoneStep/pause 350/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Now how does the Underworld fare today...$8"/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...@? @!$11"/pause 250/playSound stoneStep/pause 250/playSound stoneStep/pause 250/playSound stoneStep/pause 2500/playSound skeletonStep/pause 500/playSound wand/changeLocation Visorlights.EmetSelchCustomNPC_Emet_House/warp farmer 18 7/warp Visorlights.EmetSelch 15 7/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/faceDirection farmer 2/eyes 1 -10000/viewport 18 8 true/globalFadeToClear 0.005 true/pause 1000/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 3 2/pause 1000/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 -3 0/pause 500/eyes 4 -10000/pause 200/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 1/pause 200/emote Visorlights.EmetSelch 16/pause 900/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 1 0 1/pause 500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Finally, you decide to wake.$6#$b#How are you feeling?"/quickQuestion How are you?#Not great.#I could be better, but I think I'll be okay now.#Not bad, considering I passed out!(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Yes, I would imagine so.$0"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...About the best you could hope for, considering what you went through.$0"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Do you have any idea-!$6#$b#...$9"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "It would appear concentrations of aether in portions of the mine have become so low, crystals within the rock draw in any that comes near.$0"/pause 200/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 1/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "In this case, yours. I found you on the cavern floor, near-drained of aether.$6"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "If I hadn't chanced to find you...$0#$b#You would not have survived.$6"/pause 400/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 700/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Have I not told you I've laid enough reckless souls to rest..!!$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 1/pause 100/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Visorlights.EmetSelch -1 0 1/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 800/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...$9"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I've replenished your aether with my own, but you're like to feel weak for a time.$0#$b#Rest for the night, will you.$9"/pause 300/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 2 2/pause 600/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I will continue my search for the cause of such dramatic fluctuations.#$b#Do not count on your luck to see you through further forays. It will not last indefinitely.$6"/pause 900/advancedMove Visorlights.EmetSelch false 0 1 -3 0 0 -5/end newDay

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelchCustomNPC_10_1/e Vi: none/8 8/farmer 10 14 3 Visorlights.EmetSelch 7 9 0/addConversationTopic Visorlights.Emet_Drama_Topic 7/skippable/move farmer -3 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 500/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 500/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 29/pause 800/textAboveHead Visorlights.EmetSelch "..."/pause 900/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...@. Once more, you invite yourself into my company.#$b#Tell me; what is it that brings you here, again and again?$9"/pause 600/emote farmer 32/pause 1200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...$s"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...I see. You think us close.$0"/pause 400/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "You think yourself one whose visits I await, conversation I enjoy, counsel I value?"/pause 800/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I had thought my feelings towards each and every one of you townspeople quite clear, but allow me to leave no room for doubt.#$b#I hold no desire for your companionship.$6"/pause 600/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Yet *you* would presume yourself an exception.$u#$b#Do you honestly think I consider you my equal?$10"/pause 700/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Oh, there were those I considered such.#$b#Those who I proudly stood beside as we worked to better our world.$0"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "There was Hythlodaeus, keen of eye and mind alike.$9#$b#$9Who turned down the seat of Visorlights.EmetSelch, yet was never far when I had need of aid, no matter how his years wore on."/pause 200 /speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "And when I all but begged him to accept the seat he had rejected, so that he might live on?$9"/pause 400/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "The stubborn fool refused it until the end.$s#$b# *Insisted* that I could do so much more for the world than he, that he would gladly accept his passing if it meant such would come to fruition.$s"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "And so he did."/pause 700/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Azem, a most trusted friend on the Convocation, counselor to the people, always searching for those they might aid.$10"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Ever thrusting themselves into greater and greater dangers for the sake of others, heedless of the risks they bore.$9#$b#Azem, who I fought aside countless times-$9#$b#Who gave their very life for the people they sought to protect.$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 0/pause 700/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I labored alongside them and countless more, the truest and most noble souls of generation upon generation.#$b#Watched them grow, learn, and--#$b#--be it through time or tragedy--#$b#--fade into naught but memory.$s"/pause 200/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "And I have had my fill of it.$6"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "There is nothing you can offer me, no reason you are deserving of my esteem.$10#$b#Now I suggest you deliberate, alone, until that is understood.$10"/quickQuestion Now I suggest you deliberate, alone, until that is understood.#I don't want to do that, and I don't think you do either.#...I see.#You've got it wrong. I don't consider you that close at all.(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...Perhaps. But I will not suffer such again.$9"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...I'm sorry, @. But it is best I make myself clear here and now.$s"(break)speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...$11#$b#Excellent. I'm simply ensuring you know exactly where you stand.$u"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Now, it is best you go."/pause 2000/end invisible Visorlights.EmetSelch

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelchCustomNPC_10_2/F/e: Near The Planet Core/12 10/farmer 5 12 1 Visorlights.EmetSelch 1 1 2 Visorlights.Hythlodaeus 2 2 2/skippable/ambientLight 20 0 30/ignoreCollisions farmer/ignoreCollisions Visorlights.EmetSelch/warp Visorlights.EmetSelch -100 100/warp Visorlights.Hythlodaeus -99 -99/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 100/playSound magma_sprite_spot/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1200/glow 50 4 70 false/pause 100/addTemporaryActor Visorlights.Beaft 48 48 17 11 2 false/animate Visorlights.Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/ignoreCollisions Visorlights.Beaft/playSound yoba/playSound coldSpell/glow 50 4 70 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16/pause 100/jump farmer 8/eyes 5 -10000/startJittering/pause 500/eyes 0 -10000/pause 200/move Visorlights.Beaft -3 0 2 true/playSound magma_sprite_spot/pause 1000/animate Visorlights.Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/pause 1000/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 63/warp Visorlights.EmetSelch 10 7/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/playSound wand/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 25/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 25/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 25/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 25/pause 100/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 26/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/jump farmer 5/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 27/pause 300/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 0/startJittering/pause 400/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "*There's* that aether-$6"/pause 100/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "-@!?$11#$b#Stand back! Don't you dare try to fight that thing!$5"/pause 100/speed Visorlights.EmetSelch 4/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 2 2/speed farmer 5/move farmer -3 0 1/speed farmer 3/startJittering/pause 1000/playSound flameSpellHit/pause 10/playSound wand/screenFlash 3/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 63/addTemporaryActor Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed 128 64 6 9 2 false/animate Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed false true 100 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7/pause 2000/speed Visorlights.Beaft 4/move Visorlights.Beaft -6 0 0/animate Visorlights.Beaft false true 200 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/pause 1500/playSound swordswipe/jump Visorlights.Beaft 8/pause 50/screenFlash 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 1300/playSound swordswipe/jump Visorlights.Beaft 8/pause 50/screenFlash 1/playSound flameSpell/pause 1000/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Enough of this.$12#$b#Away with you!$13"/pause 400/stopAnimation Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed 9/pause 1000/playSound powerup/screenFlash 3/playSound serpentDie/warp Visorlights.Beaft -100 -100/addTemporaryActor Visorlights.Rift 32 32 11 10 2 false/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 0/stopMusic/pause 300/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 1/pause 400/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 2/pause 400/animate Visorlights.Rift false true 400 2 3/stopJittering/pause 1200/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed 0/pause 500/animate Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed false true 100 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7/pause 3000/stopGlowing/playMusic winter1/pause 2500/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Are you hurt?$12"/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 2 0 0/pause 100/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "That was a departed soul, trapped in this realm.$12#$b# And the cause of my recent woes besides.$13#$b#It had to have drawn in massive quantities of aether to regain form as it did.$12"/pause 600/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "I opened a passage to the aetherial sea and bid it return; The rift will close soon enough.$12"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Though I'm certain there was a pull from the other side as well...$13"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Visorlights.Rift "Oh! It's holding!"/pause 50/playSound dwoop/jump Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed 8/pause 10/emote farmer 16/pause 100/pause 1800/stopAnimation Visorlights.Rift 3/pause 400/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 4/pause 400/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 5/pause 400/animate Visorlights.Rift false true 400 6 7/pause 1000/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Theeeereee we are.$0"/pause 50/pause 200/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "An excellent show as always, my friend.$0#$b#And what a treat to see you in full form!$3"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "-Hythlodaeus! You're-$14"/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Taking my time in the Underworld?$0#$b# Well of course. We can hardly go on to the next life without our dear Hades!$3"/pause 1000/warp Visorlights.EmetSelch_Transformed -200 -200/showFrame Visorlights.EmetSelch 24/warp Visorlights.EmetSelch 9 9/animate Visorlights.EmetSelch false false 100 25 26 25 25 26 27 27 0/playSound wand/pause 1000/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 0 2 1/pause 300/move Visorlights.EmetSelch 1 0 1/pause 300/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "You're still...$2"/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Don't get the wrong idea, now. Azem and I are quite content to wait as long as we must.#$b#We wouldn't dream of keeping the most eminent Emet-Selch from his duties!$3"/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Really, because I recall otherwi-$6"/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Nonsense!$3#$b#But I do admit...#$b#I have some concerns to voice.$0"/pause 400/stopAnimation Visorlights.Rift 8/pause 400/animate Visorlights.Rift false true 400 9 8/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Concerns?$0"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "For you, love.$1#$b#I do try and see how you fare, when such glimpses are afforded to me.$1"/pause 300/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "To see you hurt, watch you refuse yourself any happiness... it's terrible.$1#$b#You've been left alone for so long, and for that I am sorry.$1"/pause 400/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "But please, don't let that be reason to deny any connection, fleeting though it may be.$1"/pause 100/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Such wonderful things will pass, yes.$1#$b#But that is true regardless of if they are experienced... or forsaken.$1"/pause 400/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "And given the choice... I would much rather see you embrace them.$0"/pause 400/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "So please, go and live a little. Share in all life has to offer!$3#$b#I suspect you have an interested party close at hand, after all.$1"/pause 1000/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "With that, I suppose I should get going. It was lovely meeting you, @.$0#$b#Do take care of our Emet-Selch, would you?$3"/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Hythlodaeus!$11"/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Now, now, I said I wouldn't interfere with your good work.#$b#Just as well, for there is a newly-arrived 'errant soul' here that could use a touch of help.#$b#I may not carry a title, but surely that is just as worthy a cause to attend to?"/pause 300/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Visorlights.EmetSelch "..."/pause 2000/textAboveHead Visorlights.EmetSelch "*sigh*"/pause 2000/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 1/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Of course the one time I wish you *would* interrupt my day with chatter is the one time you find your own work to do.$1"/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "You wish for my 'chatter', do you? I shall have to remember that when next you claim otherwise.$2#$b#After all...with a flow of so much aether, I suspect the path between realms may persist for a time. But I digress.$0"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.Hythlodaeus "Until next we meet.$0"/playSound dwop/jump Visorlights.EmetSelch 3/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "Of course I wish-$2"/pause 200/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "...$9#$b#Until next we meet.$1"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Visorlights.Rift 1/pause 500/playSound powerup/showFrame Visorlights.Rift 0/pause 500/warp Visorlights.Rift -150 -150/pause 1500/faceDirection Visorlights.EmetSelch 2/pause 900/speak Visorlights.EmetSelch "@.$0#$b#Go home and rest.$0#$b#I'll disperse any remaining aether.$9"/pause 1500/move farmer -10 0 3 true/pause 2000/end invisible Visorlights.EmetSelch
